column4: I seem to have goofed up during my update to 10.04.  If I run "$ dpkg -l "linux-image*" | grep ^ii", I can see newer kernels, but "$ uname -a" tells me I'm still running 2.6.31-14-generic.  How can I upgrade my kernel?
And by that, I mean, it says that there's 0 upgraded, 0 newly installed, etc. etc.
